title: ``None of the Above'': Measure Uncertainty in Dialog Response Retrieval
authors:
Feng, Yulan  and
Mehri, Shikib  and
Eskenazi, Maxine  and
Zhao, Tiancheng
venue: Proceedings of the 58th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics
abstract: This paper discusses the importance of uncovering uncertainty in end-to-end dialog tasks and presents our experimental results on uncertainty classification on the processed Ubuntu Dialog Corpus. We show that instead of retraining models for this specific purpose, we can capture the original retrieval modelâ€™s underlying confidence concerning the best prediction using trivial additional computation.
